title: Before we begin,
prompt_after_story_genre: story. Please come up with 1 main character who is a male and
prompt_after_number_of_girls: girls. Please fill their information using JSON format:
prompt_follow_cast_rules:
- Don't start the story yet.
- Respond only with JSON.
prompt_story_start: Please start the story and write one line of the dialogue in the following format:
prompt_after_story_format:
Please follow the following rules:
- There must be a speaker and should not be "narrator".
- The mood can only be either one of
prompt_places: - The location can be either one of
prompt_end:
- If the speaker is not the main character, the dialogue may or may not be a question to the main character.
- If the dialogue is a question, please provide up to 3 answers using "answers":[""] and the next speaker cannot be the main character.
- If the speaker is the main character, don't provide answers.
- Respond only with JSON.
prompt_continue_with_answer: Please continue based on the answer:
